org.grouplens.lenskit.data.pref

Class Preferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.pref.Preferences

  • public final class Preferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for working with preferences.

        Construct a new preference builder.
        Returns:

      • make

        public static Preference make(long uid,
              long iid,
              double val)
        Create a new preference.
        Parameters:
        uid - The user ID.
        iid - The item ID.
        val - The value.
        Returns:
        A preference with the specified properties.

      • userPreferenceVector

        public static MutableSparseVector userPreferenceVector(java.util.Collection<? extends Preference> prefs)
        Compute a user preference vector.
        Parameters:
        prefs - The user's preferences.
        Returns:
        A vector of the preferences.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the same item appears multiple times, or there are preferences from multiple users.

      • hashPreference

        public static int hashPreference(Preference preference)
        Compute the hash code of a preference. Used to implement Object.hashCode() in preference implementations.
        Parameters:
        preference - The preference.
        Returns:
        The preference's hash code.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(Preference p1,
             Preference p2)
        Compare two preferences for equality. Used to implement Object.equals(Object) in preference implementations.
        Parameters:
        p1 - The first preference.
        p2 - The second preference.
        Returns:
        Whether the two preferences are equal.
